---
title: /etc/network/interfaces-v2
description: Interfaces Configuration
---

```yaml

# network interface settings; autogenerated
# Please do NOT modify this file directly, unless you know what
# you're doing.
#
# If you want to manage parts of the network configuration manually,
# please utilize the 'source' or 'source-directory' directives to do
# so.
# PVE will preserve these directives, but will NOT read its network
# configuration from sourced files, so do not attempt to move any of
# the PVE managed interfaces into external files!

source /etc/network/interfaces.d/*

auto lo
iface lo inet loopback

iface lo inet6 loopback

auto eno1
iface eno1 inet static
        address <PRIMARY_IPv4_ADDRESS>/<PRIMARY_IPv4_SUBNET>
        gateway <IPv4_GATEWAY>
        up ip address add <SECONDARY_IPv4_ADDRESS>/32 dev eno1
        post-up sysctl -w net.ipv4.ip_forward=1
        post-up iptables -t nat -I PREROUTING -i eno1 -d <PRIMARY_IPv4_ADDRESS>/32 -p tcp -m multiport ! --dport 22,8006 -j DNAT --to 10.10.1.1
        post-up iptables -t nat -I PREROUTING -i eno1 -d <PRIMARY_IPv4_ADDRESS>/32 -p udp -j DNAT --to 10.10.1.1
        post-up iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i eno1 -d <SECONDARY_IPv4_ADDRESS>/32 -p udp -j DNAT --to 10.10.2.1
        post-up iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -i eno1 -d <SECONDARY_IPv4_ADDRESS>/32 -p tcp -j DNAT --to 10.10.2.1

iface eno1 inet6 static
        address <IPv6_ADDRESS>/<IPv6_SUBNET>
        gateway <IPv6_GATEWAY>

auto vmbr0
iface vmbr0 inet static
        address 10.10.1.0/31
        bridge-ports none
        bridge-stp off
        bridge-fd 0
        post-up iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -s '10.10.1.1/31' -o eno1 -j MASQUERADE
        post-down iptables -t nat -D POSTROUTING -s '10.10.1.1/31' -o eno1 -j MASQUERADE
#OPN-Sense WAN1

auto vmbr1
iface vmbr1 inet static
        address 10.10.2.0/31
        bridge-ports none
        bridge-stp off
        bridge-fd 0
        post-up iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -s '10.10.2.1/31' -o eno1 -j SNAT --to <SECONDARY_IPv4_ADDRESS>
        post-down iptables -t nat -D POSTROUTING -s '10.10.2.1/31' -o eno1 -j SNAT --to <SECONDARY_IPv4_ADDRESS>
#OPN-Sense WAN2

auto vmbr2
iface vmbr2 inet manual
        bridge-ports none
        bridge-stp off
        bridge-fd 0
        bridge-vlan-aware yes
        bridge-vids 2-4094
        ovs_type OVSBridge
#VLAN-Network
```
